solution_line_template: If Selma has fifty marbles, then Merill and Elliot together have {selma_marbles}-{fewer_marbles} = <<{selma_marbles}-{fewer_marbles}={merill_and_elliot_marbles}>>{merill_and_elliot_marbles} marbles.
The number of marbles that Elliot has is x = {merill_and_elliot_marbles}/{total_x_coefficient}
Since Merill has twice as many marbles as Elliot, Merill has {merill_multiplier}*{elliot_marbles} = <<{merill_multiplier}*{elliot_marbles}={merill_marbles}>>{merill_marbles} marbles.
